name: Bumper (itch) (shulolololo)
description:
Bumper is puzzle-platformer where you control a blue block which can create green bumpers below or above itself. These bumpers can bounce the blue block to higher platforms but you can only create three bumpers at a time. 

Controls:

In the menu screen, the "Keypad Enter" button will start the game. 

A: Left

D: Right (The "S" picture in the game is a mistake)

J: Jump

K: Create bumper below player

I: Create bumper above player

Install Instructions: 

Unzip the folder and click on Bumper.exe to play.

Side Note:

There are some bugs with pushing the block and gravity being wonky.
